main.name: Mark Leung
main.bio: Mark is a passionate and self-driven developer culminated through his 10+ years of experience designing and building enterprise software solutions.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

education.degree: Bachelors of Computer Science w/ Minor in Economics

work.title: Technical Consultant / Full-Stack Developer
responsibilities: Supported Medibank's diverse SAP systems by designing and implementing front-end and back-end enhancements with latest web technologies. Engaged with key stakeholders using technical expertise to solve production critical incidents.

work.title: Technology Consultant / Full-Stack Developer
responsibilities: Implemented feasible solutions utilizing expertise in Java & JavaScript. Responsible for fixing front-end/back-end defects, as well as web services integration across SAP Enterprise solutions with SOAP and REST API.

work.title: Programmer Analyst
responsibilities: Delivered host of new features for the company web portal, with emphasis on widget design for the internal team. I was also was entrusted with building optimization algorithms to significantly reduce the run time of the company's bank transaction processing program.

work.title: Software Developer
responsibilities: Employed and automated the company's reporting tools, significantly reducing the lead time for business turn-around by over 50 percent. Secondly, I conducted the front-end web redesign from inception to implementation of the company's corporate search portal.

work.title: QA Analyst
responsibilities: Formulated server management scripts to highlight the differences of installed packages and configurations across the companyâ€™s Linux servers. I monitored, assessed and executed application tests with industry standard testing tools.

work.title: Web Services Developer
responsibilities: Developed features for the administrative page, allowing better user experience for the customer support team. I worked with other developers to resolve browser compatibility issues and defects for the ecobee web portal.

work.title: Software Developer
responsibilities: Improved the client web portal by redesigning and streamlining the user interface for the dashboard menu. In addition, I was in charge of designing analytical web pages with tables and graphs to better illustrate alarming trends and potential risks.

projects.title: Ignite Video Game
projects.category: Video Game site built with ReactJS, Redux

testimonials.text: Mark has good understanding of Javascript and other front-end application development tools. I am confident he can add value to any team he is a part of, and will happily recommend him for any role he sets his sights on.
